attributes.action: Save St Mary's Birth Centre, Melton Mowbray
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A maternity ward for new mums has been shut while health managers decide whether they can afford to keep it open.
Patients, politicians and health campaigners are furious at the loss of beds at St Mary's Birth Centre, in Melton Mowbray, which provide post-natal care for new mums.
There are fears it is the first step to moving all maternity services to Leicester General Hospital and Leicester Royal Infirmary.
The closure of the ward means mums will now be sent home, or transferred to other hospitals just hours after their baby is born.
